es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel
Class WorkItem

java.lang.Object
  es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel.WorkItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
Identifiable, WorkItem, Prioritizable, java.lang.Comparable<WorkItem>
public class WorkItem
extends java.lang.Object
implements WorkItem

Represents an element carrying out an activity. Work items are used as part of a work thread every time a new activity has to be performed.

Author:
Iván Castilla Rodríguez

Constructor Summary

          Creates a new work item belonging to work thread wThread.

checkCaughtResources

public boolean checkCaughtResources()
Checks if the list of resources selected to carry out an activity are still valid.

Returns:
True if none of the selected resources is being used by a different element; false in other case.

Returns true if any one of the resources taken to carry out an activity is active in more than one AM

True if any one of the resources taken to carry out an activity is active in more than one AM; false in other case.

catchResources

protected long catchResources()
Catch the resources needed for each resource type to carry out an activity.

Returns:
The minimum availability timestamp of the taken resources

releaseCaughtResources

protected void releaseCaughtResources()
Releases the resources caught by this item to perform the activity.

resetConflictZone

protected void resetConflictZone()
Creates a new conflict zone. This method should be invoked previously to any activity request.

setConflictZone

protected void setConflictZone(es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel.ConflictZone zone)
Establish a different conflict zone for this work item.

Parameters:
zone - The new conflict zone for this work item.

removeFromConflictZone

protected void removeFromConflictZone()
Removes this single flow from its conflict list. This method is invoked in case the work item detects that it can not carry out an activity.

getConflictZone

protected es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel.ConflictZone getConflictZone()
Returns the conflict zone of this work item.

Returns:
The conflict zone of this work item.

mergeConflictList

protected void mergeConflictList(WorkItem wi)
Merges the conflict list of this work item and other one. Since one conflict zone must be merged into the other, the election of the work item which "receives" the merging operation depends on the id of the work item: the item with lower id "receives" the merging, and the other one "produces" the operation.

Parameters:
wi - The work item whose conflict zone must be merged.

waitConflictSemaphore

protected void waitConflictSemaphore()
Obtains the stack of semaphores from the conflict zone and goes through this stack performing a wait operation on each semaphore.

signalConflictSemaphore

protected void signalConflictSemaphore()
Goes through the stack of semaphores performing a signal operation on each semaphore.

public java.lang.String toString()
